title: ADD_DAYS
description: Returns a Date or Datetime adjusted by the specified number of days, either forward (positive) or backward (negative), relative to the provided Date or Datetime.

parameters.name: date/datetime
parameters.description: The original Date or Datetime to adjust.

parameters.name: num
parameters.description: The number of months to add (positive) or subtract (negative).

examples:
ADD_DAYS(DATE(2024, 8, 8), 4)
-- Returns a Date 4 days after 2024-08-08.
-- Result: 2024-08-12.

ADD_DAYS(NOW(), -3)
-- Returns a Datetime 3 days before now.

tips.text: The return type depends on the first argument: if it's a Date, the result is a Date; if it's a Datetime, the result is a Datetime.
